name: mlsysbook-workbench
description: Build, debug, validate, and publish the ML Systems textbook

commands.title: MLSysBook: Quick Parallel Debug Selected Chapters (PDF)

mlsysbook.executionMode.description: Execution mode for MLSysBook commands. Raw always shows integrated terminal logs.

mlsysbook.chapterOrderSource.description: Source file preference for chapter ordering in Build/Debug lists. Auto tries PDF first, then EPUB, then HTML, then PDF copyedit.

mlsysbook.revealTerminalOnFailure.description: Show a Reveal Terminal action when a focused run fails.

mlsysbook.parallelDebugWorkers.description: Default worker count for parallel chapter debug jobs.

mlsysbook.keepFailedWorktrees.description: Keep temporary worktrees for failed parallel debug jobs for manual inspection.

mlsysbook.parallelDebugRoot.description: Relative directory under the repo root where parallel debug worktrees are created.

mlsysbook.enableQmdChunkHighlight.description: Apply subtle editor background highlighting for QMD chunks (callouts, divs, fenced code, and labeled figure/table/listing lines).

mlsysbook.enableQmdDiagnostics.description: Enable MLSysBook inline QMD diagnostics (cross-reference and inline-python checks). Disable to avoid diagnostic squiggles while writing.

mlsysbook.qmdVisualPreset.description: Visual intensity preset for QMD highlighting (inline refs, label definitions, and structural region emphasis).

mlsysbook.highlightInlineReferences.description: Highlight inline @references in QMD prose (including @fig-/@tbl-/@sec- style references).

mlsysbook.highlightLabelDefinitions.description: Highlight label definition patterns like {#fig-...} and #| label: fig-....

mlsysbook.highlightDivFenceMarkers.description: Highlight Quarto div fence marker lines (::: and ::::).

mlsysbook.highlightSectionHeaders.description: Highlight section headers (## to ######) with depth-based background intensity.

mlsysbook.highlightTables.description: Highlight markdown pipe table regions (including nearby table caption line when present).

mlsysbook.highlightFootnotes.description: Highlight footnote references and definition markers (e.g. [^fn-...] and [^fn-...]:).

mlsysbook.highlightFootnoteBlockBackgrou.description: Highlight footnote definition block backgrounds. Disabled by default to reduce visual noise.

mlsysbook.colorSectionH2Bg.description: Optional override for H2 section header background color (e.g., rgba(...) or #RRGGBB). Empty uses preset default.

mlsysbook.colorSectionH3Bg.description: Optional override for H3 section header background color.

mlsysbook.colorSectionH4Bg.description: Optional override for H4 section header background color.

mlsysbook.colorSectionH5Bg.description: Optional override for H5 section header background color.

mlsysbook.colorSectionH6Bg.description: Optional override for H6 section header background color.

mlsysbook.colorFigureLabelBg.description: Optional override for figure label line highlight background (#fig-...).

mlsysbook.colorTableLabelBg.description: Optional override for table label line highlight background (#tbl-...).

mlsysbook.colorListingLabelBg.description: Optional override for listing label line highlight background (#lst-...).

mlsysbook.colorTableRegionBg.description: Optional override for full table region background highlight.

mlsysbook.colorFootnoteRegionBg.description: Optional override for footnote block background highlight.

mlsysbook.colorInlineReference.description: Optional override for inline reference text color (@...).

mlsysbook.colorStructuralReference.description: Optional override for structural reference text color (@fig-, @tbl-, @sec-, @lst-, @eq-).

mlsysbook.colorSectionReference.description: Optional override for section reference text color (@sec-...).

mlsysbook.colorFigureReference.description: Optional override for figure reference text color (@fig-...).

mlsysbook.colorTableReference.description: Optional override for table reference text color (@tbl-...).

mlsysbook.colorListingReference.description: Optional override for listing reference text color (@lst-...).

mlsysbook.colorEquationReference.description: Optional override for equation reference text color (@eq-...).

mlsysbook.colorSectionLabelDefinition.description: Optional override for section label definition text color ({#sec-...}, #| label: sec-...).

mlsysbook.colorFigureLabelDefinition.description: Optional override for figure label definition text color ({#fig-...}, #| label: fig-...).

mlsysbook.colorTableLabelDefinition.description: Optional override for table label definition text color ({#tbl-...}, #| label: tbl-...).

mlsysbook.colorListingLabelDefinition.description: Optional override for listing label definition text color ({#lst-...}, #| label: lst-...).

mlsysbook.colorEquationLabelDefinition.description: Optional override for equation label definition text color ({#eq-...}, #| label: eq-...).

mlsysbook.colorLabelDefinition.description: Optional override for label definition text color ({#fig-...}, #| label: ...).

mlsysbook.colorDivFenceMarker.description: Optional override for div fence marker text color (::: / ::::).

mlsysbook.colorFootnoteReference.description: Optional override for inline footnote reference text color ([^...]).

mlsysbook.colorFootnoteDefinitionMarker.description: Optional override for footnote definition marker text color ([^...]:).

mlsysbook.autoFoldOnOpen.description: Automatically fold configured QMD block kinds when opening a chapter file.

mlsysbook.autoFoldKinds.description: Controls which block kinds are auto-folded on open. Default folds TikZ regions only.

mlsysbook.navigatorVisibleEntryKinds.description: Controls which entry types are shown in Chapter Navigator sections.

mlsysbook.navigatorFollowCursor.description: Automatically reveal the current section in Chapter Navigator as cursor moves through a QMD file.

mlsysbook.navigatorClickToOpen.description: Open editor location when clicking a navigator item. Keep disabled to avoid accidental jumps while browsing.

mlsysbook.defaultNavigatorPreset.description: Workspace default preset for Chapter Navigator filters.
